name: David Alejandro Pèrez
info: Hello! My name is David, my specialty is frontend development. I'm very good at minimalist design, although I like to go a little further. If you're looking for a frontend developer, look no further. I'm the person you need!

projects.name: BlogDalepp
projects.description: Here I showcase many of my experiences as a programmer and I give you some advice based on my mistakes and successes

projects.name: Template
projects.description: Create your own portfolio easily: beautiful, simple, and without leaving out any important information.

projects.name: CineDataVault
projects.description: Discover movies effortlessly: trailers, ratings, and all the details you need in one beautifully designed place.

SEO.title: David Alejandro
SEO.author: David
SEO.description: Crea tu portafolio profesional con nuestro template fácil de personalizar. Desarrollado con Next.js y Tailwind CSS, integra tus datos rápidamente usando JSON. Ideal para desarrolladores y diseñadores.
